comment: Very floral and toasted oak. Not much sweetness to it. I prefer my roasted marshmallows Double Barreled
Too much oak. Amazing if cut with ice
I'm a huge fan of this bourbon - I will add tasting notes the next time I try it.  This bottle was actually bottled in the Fall of 2016.
I have the Fall 2016. Full bodied with vanilla and nice spice. The nose is stronger than the taste in a pleasant way. Maybe some nut flavors? That’s about the extent of my tasting abilities;-)
Awesome Oakey notes w a huge Carmel bomb on the nose very smooth with maple syrup taste and then the peppery finish we all love and expect and it lasts grab it if you can fellas
Lots of oak, obviously, but very mellow.  Butter and butterscotch.  Not a fan of the regular double oaked, but this was a pretty good pour.
Very heavy on the wood flavors and "smoke" profile.  A darker flavor than the regular Woodford
I got pineapple out of this one. Like pina colada.
So awesome!!! Happy Independence Day all!
Very rich. Heavy compared to Woodford Reserve.
A little too spicy for me.  Excellent structure.
